title: Загадки человечества с Олегом Шишкиным
overview: An unexpected look at the most incredible events of history and modern times. You will travel to places that are not on the map, the mysteries of dangerous relics and ancient prophecies. Inexplicable facts and historical sensations of different eras will be studied - and will find a convincing explanation. The host of the program is a traveler, historian, specialist in secret societies, a world-renowned expert in the field of Eastern religions, the author of books on the history of the occult and intelligence.
